TextView.android:text: 1) I am no longer a danger to myself or others.
2) I can now manage thoughts and behaviors that were previously considered dangerous to myself or others.
3) I am demonstrating healthy behaviors.
4) I have verbalized a plan if I begin to feel unsafe.
5) I am not verbalizing or glorifying dangerous acts.
6 ) I am able to identify problems that led to being referred for services.
7) I understand how my behavior may have contributed to problems.
8) I am motivated to address my problem(s) and change my behavior.
9) I am able to idenfity potential issues and events that could contribute to going back to my previous high-risk behavior.
10) I am open to hearing feedback related to problems in my life.
11) I understand how my behaviors were dangerous.
12) I do not accept blame for problems considered out of my control (i.e. abuse).
13) I have identified personal strengths to encourage coping and decrease stress.
14) I have identified weaknesses that discourage coping and increase stress.
15) I am willing to increase my social support.
16) I have identified healthy behaviors that I need to demonstrate.
17) I can solve my problems and make decisions in a healthy way.
18) I am willing to explore alternatives that led to unhealthy dangerous behaviors.
19) I agree to attend follow-up services.
20) My parent(s)/guardian(s) are willing to comply with follow-up recommendations.
21) My family and me have identified adequate resources (financial, transportation, etc.) to follow recommendations.
22) I have access to support outside the immediate home environment.
23) My parent(s)/guardian(s) have access to support outside the immediate home environment.
24) I have identified appropriate services resources.
25) My parent(s)/guardian(s) believe I can benefit from further counseling.
